name: Cats of Ulthar
description: The Cats of Ulthar are a swarm of Huge agile cats that can occupy the same space as others, utilizing their coordinated attacks and exceptional agility to overwhelm foes.
memorable: Their unique Feline Terror ability can incapacitate enemies with fear, disrupting their actions and placements.
goals: They typically aim to overwhelm and incapacitate their enemies through fear and swarming tactics.
relations: They may be associated with other beasts or creatures that utilize swarm tactics.
environment: Often found in urban areas or places where they can form swarms.
strengths: Exceptional agility and swarming capability, with the ability to inflict significant damage through coordinated bites.
weaknesses: Low physical strength, Constitution, and Intelligence scores make them vulnerable to certain attacks and challenges.
attacks: They can perform coordinated bites that deal significant piercing damage, targeting up to two creatures at once.
most_powerful_ability: Feline Terror, which can incapacitate creatures with fear, causing them to fall prone for one minute.
senses: They possess Keen Senses, allowing them advantage on perception checks based on sight, hearing, or smell.
skills: They have a notably high Stealth skill, making them adept at avoiding detection.
additional_information: Swarm ability enables them to share space with other creatures.
Damage resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing.
Condition immunities include charmed, frightened, and paralyzed.
Feline Terror can disrupt enemy combat effectiveness.
They cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
test_queries: swarm of agile cats with fear abilities
huge cats that can incapacitate enemies
monster that overwhelms foes with numbers
fear-inducing cats swarm in urban areas
